channel.description: Recent content in Cisco on XenoBlog

item.title: The mystery of why Cisco AnyConnect stopped working
item.description: A while back I tried to update my Intel Centrino Ultimate 6300 Wifi NIC to the latest drivers, to test Intel MY wifi while I was out travelling, but I never got it to work, it said it could not detect a suitable adaptor.
